generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.id: Used to pair block rules with ure Templates and to randomly place Structure Templates using a weighted list.
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Used To Pair Block Rules With Structure Templates And To Randomly Place Structure Templates Using A Weighted List World

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: Identifier of the template pool. Used by Jigsaw Structures to assign processors to Structure Templates.

fields.title: Elements
fields.description: List of Structure Template and processor list pairs.

fields.title: Element
fields.description: A grouping of a Structure Template, the Processor List to use when placing the structure, and its weight that determines the likelihood of the element being chosen.

fields.title: V1 21 20 JigsawureTemplatePool ElementType
fields.description: The type of element. Currently, only minecraft:single_pool_element is supported.

fields.title: Location
fields.description: The path of the structure file. This path is relative to the behavior pack's structures folder.

fields.title: Processors
fields.description: The identifier of the processor list to use when placing the structure.

fields.title: Weight
fields.description: The weighted probability of choosing the element from the pool. For example, a template pool containing 2 structures with weights of 1 and 3 will have a 25% and 75% chance of being chosen respectively.

fields.title: V1 21 20 JigsawureTemplatePool Projection
fields.description: Specifies how structures should be placed relative to the terrain.

fields.title: Fallback
fields.description: Fallback template pool to use if no element in the pool can be placed successfully.
